blogPost.excerpt: Newny is a Live Q&A, Feedback and Insights tool made for organisations that use webinars, workshops and other forms of virtual events as a customer engagement channel.
blogPost.body: Newny is a Live Q&A, Feedback and Insights tool made for organisations that use webinars, workshops and other forms of virtual events as a customer engagement channel.
blogPost.title: Newny - Live Q&A, feedback and Insights tool for virtual events
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Newny是一款实时问答、反馈和见解工具，适用于使用网络研讨会、研讨会和其他形式的虚拟活动作为客户参与渠道的组织。
localize.tagline: 虚拟活动的现场问答、反馈和洞察工具

localize.description: Newny是一款實時問答、反饋和見解工具，適用於使用網絡研討會、研討會和其他形式的虛擬活動作爲客戶參與渠道的組織。
localize.tagline: 虛擬活動的現場問答、反饋和洞察工具

previous.excerpt: Handoff Helpers is a free component library that helps you effectively communicate your designs 💪 —— It includes components like: - Prototype Table of Contents - Link trees - To-do lists - All kinds of organizers - Status indicators - and more!
previous.title: Handoff Helpers - Free Figma library to make designers better communicators

localize.description: Handoff Helpers是一个免费的组件库，可以帮助你有效地沟通你的设计💪 --它包括的组件有。- 原型目录--链接树--待办事项列表--各种组织者--状态指示器--等等!
localize.tagline: 免费的Figma库让设计师成为更好的沟通者

localize.description: Handoff Helpers是一個免費的組件庫，可以幫助你有效地溝通你的設計💪 --它包括的組件有。- 原型目錄--鏈接樹--待辦事項列表--各種組織者--狀態指示器--等等!
localize.tagline: 免費的Figma庫讓設計師成爲更好的溝通者

next.excerpt: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
next.title: The Podcast Audience Graph - Visualize podcast audience connections in 3D.

localize.description: 我们根据Apple Podcasts中的 "听众也订阅 "数据收集了280万个播客连接。现在，你可以在3D图中直观地看到任何播客的邻居（以及它的邻居的邻居），并看到哪些其他播客有类似的听众。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可视化播客的受众连接。

localize.description: 我們根據Apple Podcasts中的 "聽衆也訂閱 "數據收集了280萬個播客連接。現在，你可以在3D圖中直觀地看到任何播客的鄰居（以及它的鄰居的鄰居），並看到哪些其他播客有類似的聽衆。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可視化播客的受衆連接。
